I moved through the familiar rituals of preparing dinner for one, each step heavy with routine. And yet, amidst this maelstrom of grief and longing, there was also a strange comfort in that solitary vigil. For in that moment, I was not alone in my sorrow; she was here too, embodied by that empty seat and dusty vase, reminders of the love we shared and the life we'd built together.
